author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Sports Authority of India will be conducting selection trials for residential and non-residential schemes for several games for the year 2016-17 on January 11 and 12. These include hockey (residential for boys and non-residential for girls), kabbadi (residential and non-residential for boys), weightlifting (residential for boys and non-residential for boys and girls), volleyball (residential and non-residential for boys and girls) and table tennis (non-residential for boys and girls), said a press release. Details about selection criteria are available at the Puducherry office of the Sports Authority of India, Training Centre, Indira Gandhi Sports Complex, Uppalam, where application forms can be collected as well.

Eligible sportspersons have to submit the application along with three copies of the latest passport size photographs, attested copies of residential proof (ration or Aadhar card), attested photocopies of birth certificate issued by panchayat municipality or the Class 10 or 12 mark statement, sports achievement certificates, and medical fitness certificate from a qualified medical officer.

Lateral entry is available for those who have achieved the desired performance in the district, state, national and international level competitions and have successfully completed the battery of tests, technical and specific skill tests.

The last date for submission of completed application forms with required documents is January 10.
title: SAI selection trials on January 11 and 12
